bugs.creator: Xixi
bugs.cf_release_notes: Prior to this update, RHN Proxy Server 5.4 was capable of filtering only a minimal variety of headers, specifically, only 'X-*', 'content-length', 'user-agent', 'content-type', and 'range' headers. This prevented configuration file deployment via RHN Proxy Server 5.4 since the rhncfg-client and the rhncfg-manager actions did not work properly and resulted in the "500 Internal Server Error" or the "400 Bad Request" protocol error. With this update, other headers, namely headers defined by RFC 2616, are now supported.
bugs.summary: Proxy should allow all header from rfc2616

bugs.creator: Xixi
bugs.cf_release_notes: Previously, package uploads from the rhn_package_manager tool failed on RHN Proxy Server 5.4 with the parent http://rhn.redhat.com/. With this update, the uploading process succeeds.
bugs.summary: RHN proxy 5.4: rhn_package_manager unable to upload packages due to md5sum error

bugs.creator: Xixi
bugs.cf_release_notes: Previously, package uploads from the rhn_package_manager tool failed with an error in the verbose mode on RHN Proxy Server 5.4 with the parent http://rhn.redhat.com/. With this update, the uploading process succeeds.
bugs.summary: RHN Proxy 5.4: rhn_package_manager fails with errors in verbose mode

bugs.creator: Martin Poole
bugs.cf_release_notes: The WebUI installer for Red Hat Network Proxy Server 5.4 did not produce a valid configuration for the OSA jabberd service. With this update, jabberd is configured correctly.
bugs.summary: Installer produces invalid configuration for osa jabber server.

bugs.creator: Martin Poole
bugs.cf_release_notes:
When installing RHN Proxy Server 5.3, the configure-proxy.sh script was unable to set up the jabberd service, and failed with the following error:

  /usr/sbin/configure-proxy.sh: line 359: /usr/bin/spacewalk-setup-jabberd: No such file or directory

With this update, this error has been fixed, and the installation of RHN Proxy Server 5.3 no longer fails.
bugs.summary: Cannot install proxy 5.3 using spacewalk-proxy-installer-1.1.2-1.el5sat

bugs.cf_release_notes:
Cause:
Incorrect HTTP response headers
Consequence:
Kickstart over RHN Proxy from a RHN Satellite 5.4.1 on RHEL6 fails
Fix:
Correct handling of HTTP response headers
Result:
Kickstart over RHN Proxy from a RHN Satellite 5.4.1 on RHEL6  works now
